testcase.name: Integration Test: Analytics Routes > GET /api/analytics/stats > should return analytics statistics
Integration Test: Analytics Routes > GET /api/analytics/stats > should require authentication
Integration Test: Analytics Routes > GET /api/analytics/usage > should return usage analytics
Integration Test: Analytics Routes > GET /api/analytics/maturity > should return maturity scores
Integration Test: Notifications Routes > GET /api/notifications > should return user notifications
Integration Test: Notifications Routes > GET /api/notifications > should require authentication
Integration Test: Notifications Routes > GET /api/notifications/counts > should return notification counts
Integration Test: Notifications Routes > PATCH /api/notifications/:id/read > should mark notification as read
Integration Test: Notifications Routes > POST /api/notifications/mark-all-read > should mark all notifications as read
Integration Test: Notifications Routes > DELETE /api/notifications/:id > should delete notification
PMO Context API > GET /api/pmo-context/:projectId > should return PMO context with phase information
PMO Context API > GET /api/pmo-context/:projectId > should return 404 for non-existent project
PMO Context API > GET /api/pmo-context/:projectId > should include allowed actions for current phase
PMO Context API > GET /api/pmo-context/:projectId > should include system messages based on phase
PMO Context API > GET /api/pmo-context/:projectId/task-labels > should return task labels with PMO relevance

testcase.name: Integration Test: Settings Routes > GET /api/settings > should return user settings
Integration Test: Settings Routes > GET /api/settings > should require authentication
